thread.title: Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms are coming...for a few of you
thread.title_full: Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms are coming...for a few of you

author: Erin Edgemon | eedgemon@al.com
title: Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms are coming...for a few of you
text:
Marshmallow-only Lucky Charms are coming...for a few of you marshmallow only Lucky Charms.png Comments 
Cereal lovers your dreams have come true. Well, for a very limited number of you. 
The makers of Lucky Charms are producing 10 marshmallow-only boxes of the beloved cereal, and it's hosting a contest to select the lucky winners. 
There's three ways to enter the #Lucky10 sweepstakes , which is promoted in song by beatboxer Biz Markie. 
All you have to do is get creative and post a photo of yourself with an "imaginary" box of Lucky Charms on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter and include the hashtag #Lucky10Sweepstakes in your post. 
The contest ends Oct. 18. 
Oh, and those who aren't feeling particularly lucky can just buy a similar product from Amazon . ‚Äî Krystal Fondon‚ù§ (@KrystalFondon26) October 15, 2015 @LuckyCharms don't no if i can enter this comp as I'm in the UK ,but my cat is showing youüòâüò∫ #Lucky10Sweepstakes pic.twitter.com/qiY8q4fUm3
